Print the CLI version

Usage:
  example version [flags]

Aliases:
  version, ver

Examples:

../../examples/cobra/example version
../../examples/cobra/example version -o=json
../../examples/cobra/example version -o=yaml
../../examples/cobra/example version -o=short


Flags:
  -h, --help            help for version
  -o, --output string   Output format. One of: json | pretty | short | yaml (default "pretty")
